name: Project TACO
body:
### Technology And Coding Organization 2012-2013
*** *** ***
### Progress #### Phase One - Bad Guys Meet Player - [X] Controls - [-] Ability - [X] Bad Guy - [-] Scoring
#### Phase Two - The Time is Near - [-] High Scores - [-] Waves - [ ] Enemy 2 - [ ] Ability 2 - [ ] Add Sprites - [ ] Increase Code Readability - [ ] Documentation
#### Phase Three - They Strike - [ ] Rock, Paper, Scissors - [ ] Level Up Mechanics: Basics - [ ] General Abilities - [ ] Enemy Personality (AI) - [ ] Music, Sound Effects, and PEW PEW!!!
#### Phase Four - The Coders Strike Back; The Viruses (Bugs) Die - [ ] Kill Any Obvious Bugs - [ ] Update Sprites - [ ] Update Movement & Feel - [ ] Leveling Pt. 2 - [ ] CLEAN UP CODE
#### Phase Five - Are We There Yet??? (Almost) - [ ] Update Code to Android - [ ] Mobilize Graphics - [ ] Final Sounds; More Music - [ ] Settings - [ ] Menu
#### Phase Six - Destruction - [ ] Re-Examine Fun - [ ] Adjust Leveling - [ ] Game-play Speed; Replay-ability - [ ] Remove Anything Unnecessary - [ ] TEST, SUGGESTIONS, ETC.
#### Phase Seven - Deployment - [ ] PC - [ ] Android - [ ] Ouya - [ ] More Graphics - [ ] More Sound - [ ] TEST!!! - [ ] LAST MINUTE BUGS!!!
#### EXTRA - [ ] Multiplayer - [ ] Open World - [ ] Dynamic AI - [ ] Story - [ ] More Abilities - [ ] Increased RPG - [ ] More Enemies - [ ] Other
